long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin provides the possibility to look up metadata for articles and papers on dl.acm.org. 
The plugin is interactive, so users are able to see existing data, confirm data approved by others, upvote uncertain data provided by others, add new data, report errors regarding the shown data and download confirmed metadata as a CSV file. 

The goal is to provide scholars with the relevant data on one glance and give them an opportunity to contribute metadata to the article by hand interactively. 
Regarding this goals the plugin is accessible on the article main page, the E-Reader and the PDF-Reader. Users also have the opportunity to download a batch of article metadata from their personal Binder (Collection of articles on dl.acm.org)


We don't save any personal user data. The only thing saved is the interaction between the user and our plugin.
